Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mr_apps.androidbase.utils.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains basic File Utils
    Author:
    Denis Brandi, Mattia Ruggiero

      • copy

        public static void copy(java.io.File src,
        java.io.File dst)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Copies a file to another destination
        Parameters:
        src - the file to be copied
        dst - the file in which the "src" has to be copied
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if some errors occur during the copy

      • newFileToUpload

        public static java.io.File newFileToUpload(android.content.Context context,
                           java.lang.String folder,
                           FileUtils.ElementType type,
                           boolean internal)
        Generates a new file using the "type" parameter
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        folder - the folder in which the file has to be created
        type - the type of the new file. Possible values are "text, img, vid, audio" (see the ElementType enum)
        internal - true if the file has to be created in an internal folder of the app, false if the folder is in the root
        Returns:
        the new file created

      • getTempImageFolder

        public static java.io.File getTempImageFolder(android.content.Context context,
                              java.lang.String folder,
                              boolean internal)
        Gets the folder passed by parameter, or creates a new one if it doesn't exist
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        folder - the name of the folder that has to be returned/created
        internal - true if the folder has to be finded/created in the app folder, false if the folder has to be finded/created in the root
        Returns:
        the folder passed by parameter, or a new one if it doesn't exist

      • getFilePath

        public static java.io.File getFilePath(android.content.Context context,
                       java.lang.String folder)
        Gets the path of the given file/folder
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        folder - the name of the file/folder
        Returns:
        the path of the existing file/folder, or the path of a new file/folder if it doesn't exist

      • getExternalPath

        public static java.lang.String getExternalPath(java.lang.String folder)
        Gets the path of the given file/folder, searching or creating it from the root folder
        Parameters:
        folder - the name of the file/folder
        Returns:
        the path of the existing file/folder, or the path of a new file/folder if it doesn't exist

      • getOrientation

        public static int getOrientation(android.content.Context context,
                 android.net.Uri photoUri)
        Useful method to gets the orientation of a photo
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        photoUri - the Uri of the photo
        Returns:
        the orientation of the photo, using the ExifInterface integers

      • generateFileFromBitmap

        public static java.io.File generateFileFromBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                                  java.lang.String folder,
                                  android.graphics.Bitmap photo,
                                  boolean internal,
                                  int quality)
        Generates a new file from the given bitmap, saving it in the specified folder
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        folder - the name of the folder in which the file has to be saved
        photo - the bitmap to be converted to a file
        internal - true if the file has to be saved in an internal folder of the app, false if the folder is in the root
        quality - the quality of the compression of the bitmap: the range of values goes from 1 (min quality) to 100 (max quality)
        Returns:
        the file generated from the bitmap

      • generateFileFromBitmap

        public static java.io.File generateFileFromBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                                  java.lang.String folder,
                                  android.graphics.Bitmap photo,
                                  java.lang.String fileName,
                                  int quality)
        Generates a file from the given bitmap and saves it in the given folder
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        folder - the folder in which the file has to be saved
        photo - the bitmap photo
        fileName - the name of the new file
        Returns:
        the generated file, or null if a file with the same name already exists in the folder

      • getResizedImageFile

        public static java.io.File getResizedImageFile(android.content.Context context,
                               java.lang.String folder,
                               java.io.File f,
                               int maxSize,
                               boolean internal,
                               int quality)
                                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reduces the size of the image
        Parameters:
        f - the file containing the image to reduce
        maxSize - max size of the image (width or height)
        Returns:
        the file with the image resized
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • getRealPath

        public static java.lang.String getRealPath(android.content.Context context,
                           android.net.Uri uri)
        Get a file path from a Uri. This will get the the path for Storage Access Framework Documents, as well as the _data field for the MediaStore and other file-based ContentProviders.
        Parameters:
        context - The context.
        uri - The Uri to query.

      • checkAudioDuration

        public static boolean checkAudioDuration(android.content.Context context,
                         android.net.Uri audio)
        Method that uses a constant parameter to determine if a audio file is too long or not
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        audio - the Uri of the audio file
        Returns:
        true if the file is less than 2 minutes long, false otherwise

      • checkVideoDuration

        public static boolean checkVideoDuration(android.content.Context context,
                         android.net.Uri filmedVideo)
        Method that uses a constant parameter to determine if a video file is too long or not
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        filmedVideo - the Uri of the video file
        Returns:
        true if the file is less than 30 seconds long, false otherwise

      • getPath

        public static FileUtils.MediaSelected getPath(android.content.Context context,
                              android.net.Uri uri)
                                       throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Gets the file path of the given Uri.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        uri - the Uri of the file that has to be retrieved
        Returns:
        a MediaSelected object containing the type and the path of the file
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the given Uri isn't valid

      • getDataColumn

        public static java.lang.String getDataColumn(android.content.Context context,
                             android.net.Uri uri,
                             java.lang.String selection,
                             java.lang.String[] selectionArgs)
        Get the value of the data column for this Uri. This is useful for MediaStore Uris, and other file-based ContentProviders.
        Parameters:
        context - The context.
        uri - The Uri to query.
        selection - (Optional) Filter used in the query.
        selectionArgs - (Optional) Selection arguments used in the query.
        Returns:
        The value of the _data column, which is typically a file path.

      • isExternalStorageDocument

        public static boolean isExternalStorageDocument(android.net.Uri uri)
        Parameters:
        uri - The Uri to check.
        Returns:
        Whether the Uri authority is ExternalStorageProvider.

      • isDownloadsDocument

        public static boolean isDownloadsDocument(android.net.Uri uri)
        Parameters:
        uri - The Uri to check.
        Returns:
        Whether the Uri authority is DownloadsProvider.

      • isMediaDocument

        public static boolean isMediaDocument(android.net.Uri uri)
        Parameters:
        uri - The Uri to check.
        Returns:
        Whether the Uri authority is MediaProvider.
